^ [name="C"];
^ [name="B"];
^ [name="A"];
^ [name="D"];
A->B [msg="ab()" tag="2" data="tooltip" url="http://stackoverflow.com"];
B->C [msg="bc(TRUE)" url="http://news.bbc.co.uk"];
  ---  [ title="If more to run" ID="*" ];
{B} [state="shutting down" url="http://cjira:8080" msg="msg(shutdown)"];
<B C> [title="Spanning Box" sev="info"];
<A> [title="error occurred" sev="critical"];
<A> [title="warning occurred" sev="major"];
<B> [title="box with a url" sev="minor" url="http://cjira:8080"];
<B> [title="box" sev="info" url="http://en.wikipedia.org"];
<B> [title="box" sev="intermittent"];
<A> [title="error cleared" sev="clear" data="tooltip"];
<A B> [title="error cleared" sev="clear" data="tooltip"];
